amendment.description: The above was replaced with the language contained in the Mollohan (A023) substitute amendment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in teh Congressional Record of July 29, 1997 to prohibit the use of any funds in the bill to promote the sale or export of tobacco products, or to remove or reduce marketing restrictions on the export of U.S. tobacco products to other countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Doggett amendment (A022) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
